tool.name: Reverse.seqs
tool.command:
echo 'reverse.seqs( fasta=$fasta )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$fasta" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.rc.* "$out_fasta"
tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The reverse.seqs_ command will generate a fasta containing the reverse complement of each sequence in the input fasta.
.. _reverse.seqs: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Reverse.seqs
